channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump appoints Louisiana governor to serve as special envoy to Greenland
item.description: President Trump on Sunday announced he is appointing Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry to serve as the U.S. special envoy to Greenland, the vast, semi-autono...

item.title: Try To Avoid Sending Christmas Letters About Your Perforated Bowel
item.description: We have received multiple-page Christmas letters, which should be punished as the hate crime that it is.

item.title: Why Hasn’t Trump’s CDC Ditched This Rule That Punishes Neighborhoods For Being Too White?
item.description: Race discrimination is illegal and unconstitutional regardless of 'equitable' motives.

item.title: Stop Calling Cardinal Dolan a Conservative
item.description: Partisan labels do not apply to the former — or to the new — archbishop of New York.

item.title: Cheers for Ben Shapiro
item.description: He has put down an important marker, and anyone vested in the health of the conservative movement should be grateful.

item.title: New Docs Reveal Shocking Lengths Obama And Biden Went To Protect Hillary Clinton, Get Trump
item.description: Not only did the Obama and Biden Administrations go to great lengths to protect Hillary Clinton, they went to unconstitutional lengths to get Trump.

item.title: JD Vance Picks a Side
item.description: Vance will pretend as though he is disinterestedly arbitrating a political dispute on the right, but he’s not.

item.title: The Productive Path to Affordability
item.description: To make everyday goods and services more affordable, we must unleash the innovation and creativity of the marketplace.

item.title: Michigan Election Integrity Warriors Stop ‘Disastrous’ Ranked-Choice Voting Drive

item.title: The Health Care-Industrial Complex Is Lying About Obamacare Premiums Doubling — And They Know It
item.description: Many reporters have taken KFF’s claim that 'premium payments will double' to mean that total 'premiums will double,' but that's just not true.

item.title: Republicans Still Crave the Mainstream Media’s Affection
item.description: What else are we to infer from the Vanity Fair episode?
